why-need.title: Why Need Charm AI Assistant & CHARM GPT?

first.text: Want to impress your crush effortlessly? Our AI dating GPT, trained on countless successful dating cases, offers proven chat techniques tailored to your unique personality. Whether you're shy or outgoing, you'll quickly master the art of flirting and make incredible strides in your dating life!

second.text: Worried about privacy? Don't be! Charm AI never save your chat records or screenshots. Share your dating stories freely with our AI coach and receive honest advice without compromising your privacy. With this trustworthy dating assistant, you can fully enjoy the exciting journey of love!

reply-by-text.title: Charm AI Chat
reply-by-text.subtitle: Manually enter the chat history and Charm AI will provide reply suggestions

instructions.title: How to use:
instructions.text:
1. Enter the conversation messages
2. Click 'Their Message' for messages from the other person
3. Click 'My Message' for your messages
4. Click 'Get Reply' to generate AI suggestions

reply-by-screenshot.title: Charm GPT Reply Generator
reply-by-screenshot.subtitle: Upload the chat screenshot to be replied, and Charm GPT will provide a friendly AI reply

instructions.title: How to use:
instructions.text:
1. Take a screenshot of your chat conversation
2. Click 'Upload Chat Screenshot' to select the image
3. Click 'Get Charm Reply' to generate AI suggestions

get-advice.title: Get Dating Advice

instructions.title: How to use:
